formDescription: Under the Highways Act 1980 - Part V11A

5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: staticText 1
props.content:
Before you begin

Please read the Pavement Permit application guidance (opens in new tab) before completing this form. Failure to supply any information requested may delay your application.

Online payment
You will be required to provide payment for this licence at the end of this form. After clicking the 'Pay now' button at the end of the form, you will be taken to our secure online payment website. You can then make the required payment using either a credit or a debit card.

props.label: staticText 9
props.content:
Please send confirmation of the status of application site to:

By email: 
licence.applications@brentwood.gov.uk

Or by post:
Licensing, Brentwood Borough Council, Town Hall, Ingrave Road, Brentwood, Essex CM15 8AY

Please remember to quote the reference number you will receive on submission of your application.
